1630224.effect: 2+ Rank 2 DARK Machine monsters(This card's original Rank is always treated as 2.)This card's original ATK/DEF becomes the combined ATK/DEF of all other face-up Attack position monsters you control, except "Cyber City Heaven Corp World Broadcast Station".
